summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of BISI Engineering website with focus on image loading. All images load correctly except project-9.jpg which is a broken file (contains XML error instead of image data). Logo, hero backgrounds, service images, gallery images, team photos, and MD photo all working correctly.

ui_bugs.issue: project-9.jpg (CFBC Boiler Revamping) shows placeholder instead of actual image - file is broken (contains XML 'Access Denied' error)

action_items: Replace /app/frontend/public/images/projects/project-9.jpg with a valid image file - current file is broken (111 bytes, contains XML error)
critical_code_review_comments: All image paths in mock.js are correctly configured
SafeImage component handles broken images gracefully with placeholder
Good use of framer-motion for animations
Proper responsive design with mobile hamburger menu
seed_data_creation: None - all data is mocked in /app/frontend/src/data/mock.js
context_for_next_testing_agent: All pages tested. Images verified: Logo (bisi-logo.png) ✓, Hero (hero-bg.jpg) ✓, CTA (cta-bg.jpg) ✓, Services (6 images) ✓, Projects (8 of 9 images) ✓, Gallery (12 images) ✓, Team (8 images) ✓, MD Photo ✓. Only project-9.jpg is broken.
tests_passed: Homepage loads with hero background image
Logo (bisi-logo.png) loads in navbar and footer
Services page shows all 6 service images correctly
Projects page shows 8 of 9 project images (project-9.jpg broken)
Gallery page shows all 12 gallery images
Gallery lightbox opens and closes correctly
Team page shows all 8 team member photos
About page shows MD photo correctly
Navigation dropdown works correctly with 4 sub-items
tests_failed: project-9.jpg (CFBC Boiler Revamping) - file is broken, shows placeholder

image_verification.services: ✓ All 6 service images load correctly (erection.jpg, boiler.jpg, maintenance.jpg, pipeline.jpg, commissioning.jpg, revamping.jpg)
image_verification.projects: 8/9 - project-9.jpg is broken (111 bytes, contains XML error)
image_verification.team: ✓ All 8 team member photos load correctly

mocked_data_note: ALL DATA IS MOCKED in /app/frontend/src/data/mock.js - No backend APIs
